fields.name: input
javadoc: The {@plainlink ItemStack} set in the input slot by the player.

fields.name: lastSoundTime
javadoc: Stores the game time of the last time the player took items from the the crafting result slot. This is used to prevent the sound from being played multiple times on the same tick.

fields.name: resultContainer
javadoc: The inventory that stores the output of the crafting recipe.

fields.name: resultSlot
javadoc: The inventory slot that stores the output of the crafting recipe.

fields.name: selectedRecipeIndex
javadoc: The index of the selected recipe in the GUI.

methods.name: canTakeItemForPickAll
javadoc: Called to determine if the current slot is valid for the stack merging (double-click) code. The stack passed in is null for the initial slot that was double-clicked.

methods.name: clickMenuButton
javadoc: Handles the given Button-click on the server, currently only used by enchanting. Name is for legacy.

methods.name: getSelectedRecipeIndex
javadoc: Returns the index of the selected recipe.

methods.name: quickMoveStack
javadoc: Handle when the stack in slot {@code index} is shift-clicked. Normally this moves the stack between the player inventory and the other inventory(s).

methods.name: removed
javadoc: Called when the container is closed.

methods.name: slotsChanged
javadoc: Callback for when the crafting matrix is changed.

methods.name: stillValid
javadoc: Determines whether supplied player can use this container
